name: Table Generator
description:
Table Generator plugin automates the addition of tabular data. Copy paste the data(currently in supported CSV format) and thatâ€™s all, the table is generated. The plugin provides the custom options that can be configured to pre-define the table cell styles.


For updates to the plugin, please consider sponsoring the project - https://www.buymeacoffee.com/zwattic


Release notes

v1.0.0

- Configurable styling includes

- Cell width, height

- Cell Padding

- Text font size and line height

- Text alignment

- Table border radius

- Supported input data format - CSV(Comma separated values)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Feature Roadmap -

1. Add constraints to cell frame, for responsive behaviour

2. Text truncation on cell

3. Option for dynamic row and column sizing

4. Take a row/column/cell template to generate the table

5. Support multiple data formats
